title: Strictly's second eliminated celebrity leaked and viewers are fuming
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly's second celebrity to leave the show has been leaked on Twitter and viewers are fuming.

Both Strictly shows are filmed on a Saturday night and while the main show is live, the results show, which airs on a Sunday, is pre-recorded.

Unsurprisingly, the bottom two celebrities and who goes home has already been leaked online.

While we know who the unlucky star is, we'll be keeping this a spoiler-free zone until after this evening's show airs.

(Image: BBC)

And while we are keeping our lips sealed some viewers are fuming that they inadvertently have had their Sunday night viewing spoilt by browsing Strictly as a hashtag on Twitter.

On Strictly fan fumed: "This is really c**p that you're spoiling the Results show like this. I only clicked on the Strictly hashtag for updates on the show and got this spoiler!"

Kelvin Fletcher and Oti Mabuse scored the first 10s of the series so are presumably safe.

(Image: PA)

(Image: ITV)

Dev Griffin and Dianne Buswell scored 36 as they danced their Couples’ Choice dance to Friend Like Me by Will Smith from Aladdin, then it was Michelle Visage and Giovanni Pernice who scored a total of 35, including three nines, dancing a Quickstep to Cabaret by Liza Minelli.

(Image: BBC)

Then Anneka Rice and Kevin Clifton who only scored 11 points for their Charleston to Woo Hoo from Kill Bill, putting them in danger.

David James and Nadiya Bychkova struggled through with16 points for their Viennese Waltz to Kiss From A Rose by Seal from Batman Forever.

While Mike Bushell and Katya Jones had a dramatic evening after Katya fell over during her routine and the pair only managed to score 18 points for their Cha Cha inspired by Magic Mike.
description: It's the second week of Strictly Come Dancing - but who will be leaving the competition before Blackpool?
